text: Anna Maria Hawa is an actress best known for role of Omar's sister in Hany Abu-Assad's film Omar which made the 86th Academy Awards's shortlist for Best Foreign Language Film. and Inheritance.http://www.rottentomatoes.com/celebrity/anna_maria_hawa/https://www.imdb.com/name/nm5420920/ ==Filmography== * Omar (2013) * Inheritance (2012) ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Living people Category:21st-century Palestinian actresses Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Palestinian film actresses Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Anna Maria Hawa
